reviewText: Fans of Mark Russell will not be disappointed in this video.  It shows hilarious spots from his 25 years of doing the PBS show plus a history of how it came about.  The only reason I gave it 4, instead of 5, stars was the disjointedness that comes from trying to squeeze 25 years into 1 hour.  His humor is timeless.
...would have been a better title for this video.  There is nothing funny about this man!  He's not clever and tries to grossly overcompensate for it.
